media:group.media:title: Bubbling oscillator with microfluidic crystals
media:group.media:description: Bubbles in this microfluidic device closely pack and form crystalline structures. Differences in dissipation cause spontaneous transitions between two states. Simulation done in Aphros https://github.com/cselab/aphros . See article https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.01513 for details and more applications.
